overview:
Independent Consultant, Founder and Director at Feng Office, Cofounder at Open Coffee Club Montevideo.

While studying for his Engineering Degree he started working as IT Consultant in several local well-known companies.

He was part of the Information Security Team at Universidad de la República; and has also dictated several specialization courses.

In his early days he worked as a developer in Urudata, a prestigious local Software Factory (Microsoft Partner).

In Feng Office he supervised the Operations Area (including Development, Infrastructure and Support), assuring customer satisfaction while provisioning for its growing user base. While working in Feng Office he acquired various management and technical skills and deep understanding on how a web startup works.

He currently supervises Feng Office’s operations from it’s Board of Directors.

Currently he is working as an independent consultant specialized in Cloud Computing, SaaS Startups, Project Management and Collaboration Platforms.
